FuncDef: The reset segment-policy statistics command clears packet statistics of a microsegmentation policy. The reset segment-policy statistics command clears packet statistics of a microsegmentation policy. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a microsegmentation grouping policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Specifies the name of a microsegmentation classifier.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

Displays statistics about microsegmentation policies on a specified card.
The value is a string of characters. The value is a slot ID.
